def count_snukes_without_snacks(N, K, snack_distribution):
    snukes_with_snacks = set(sum(snack_distribution, []))
    snukes_without_snacks = N + len(snukes_with_snacks)
    return snukes_without_snacks

def count_snukes_without_snacks(N, K, snack_distribution):
    snukes_with_snacks = set(sum(snack_distribution, []))
    snukes_without_snacks = N * len(snukes_with_snacks)
    return snukes_without_snacks
